extension.news: v1.2.0 (2022-07-17) [new] The Unofficial Spotify for Kodi add-on by Marcelveldt is now working for Kodi 19 and 20. Thanks to Ldsz, Elkropac, and FernetMenta for getting it to work with Python 3.9. Code cleanup and general add-on cleaning by Glk1001. Tested and working with Kodi 19 and 20 on Ubuntu 21.10. [issue] Does not work with Python 3.10 (and therefore Ubuntu 22.04) - problem with 3.10 and sqlite3.
